name: 2D Platformer: Re-aboard
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Project.

Modifications:

1. Used new assets to create a new field with new environmental details, spikes. 

2. Designed one level with 7 stages  to play, including one or two bonus settings.

3. Managed to create a very basic interactive storytelling embedded in the background to make the playing experience meaningful. (hopefully~)

I am either a programmer or an art designer, so you might not see big changes in the game. Though, I tried to make it different with the method we learnt in the classes. Feel free to give advice.

Wish you would have fun.

Created by Zinan Cai AKA AfeiYusha
